title: Section 179

children.text: - The "Protecting Americans from Tax Hikes Act of 2015" (PATH Act) was passed by both the House and Senate and signed into law on 12/18/2015. This bill expanded the Section 179 deduction limit to $500,000. Read the summary from the Ways and Means committee

Until further notice, Section 179 is permanent at the $500,000 level. Businesses exceeding a total of $2 million of purchases in qualifying equipment have the Section 179 deduction phase-out dollar-for-dollar and completely eliminated above $2.5 million. Additionally, the Section 179 cap will be indexed to inflation in $10,000 increments in future years.

will be extended through 2019. Businesses of all sizes will be able to depreciate 50 percent of the cost of equipment acquired and put in service during 2015, 2016 and 2017. Then bonus depreciation will phase down to 40 percent in 2018 and 30 percent in 2019.
IMPORTANT: Section 179 for Current 2016 Tax Year (This Year)
Section 179 can provide you with significant tax relief for this 2016 tax year, but
equipment and software must be financed and in place by midnight December 31, 2016
to see how much the Section 179 tax deduction can save your company.
The PATH ACT passed in December of 2015 was made retroactive for the 2015 tax year, making the Section 179 deduction for 2015 $500,000. In addition, the 50% Bonus Depreciation was reinstated.
Click Here for the fully updated Section 179 Calculator for tax year 2015.
Section 179 propertyFor purposes of this section, the term “section 179 property” means property
computer software (as defined in section 197 which is described in section 197, to which section 167 applies, and which is placed in service in a taxable year beginning after 2002 and before 2015,
tangible property (to which section 168 applies), orwhich is section 1245 property (as defined in section 1245, and which is acquired by purchase for use in the active conduct of a trade or business.

title: 2017 CONSTRUCTION KICKOFF- RB Florida Auction

children.text: Every year in sunny Orlando Florida,

Auctioneers kicks off one of the biggest equipment auctions in the world. This year the prices were high and so was our hopes for a productive 2017. We always look forward the RB Florida Auction to get the year started off right. We enjoy getting together with our Newman Tractor Florida branch and seeing other friends in the equipment industry. Its going to be a great 2017!

title: 2017 ICUEE Louisville Kentucky Expo

children.text: 2017 International Construction and Utility Equipment Exposition (ICUEE) Exposition

kicked off Tuesday, October 3 with the official Kentucky Derby bugler opening the show to a full day of exhibits, education and networking. The event was hosted for 3 days at the Kentucky Exposition Center in Louisville, Kentucky, featuring 28 acres of the newest product innovations from the leading industry manufacturers and suppliers, cutting-edge industry education, and hands-on equipment test drives and interactive product demonstrations.
Every year, Newman Tractor attends the ICUEE Expo to build relationships with new partners and collaborate with current partners, such as
as she covers the expo highlights, interviews industry leaders and gets hands on with the latest advancements in construction equipment technology.

title: On Site: H2O Construction/UPike

children.text: H2O Construction's Steve Lockhart is with Marty Malloy at the UPike site talking about the performance of Newman Tractor's new Sany Excavators and Okada Hammers.

for the new Kentucky College of Optometry. The UPIKE will be the 22nd school in the country to have a college of optometry. The Health Professions Education Building will house the Kentucky College of Optometry with its 108,000 square feet. But in order for the new building to fit in, 50,000 cubic yards of rock and dirt need to be moved.

H2O Construction has been taking on the biggest construction jobs in their region since 1983. Their newest task is working on making the way for UPIKE's new building and busting through 80 feet of rock. And they have partnered with Newman Tractor to help get through the rock wall.

Newman Tractor has recently became a dealer of Sany Excavators and Okada Hammers. And these tough conditions, as Marty Malloy puts it, are a "pretty good test" for the durability of the Sany Excavators and Okada Hammers.

Steve Lockhart of H2O Construction is gratified by the rugged performances of the Sany Excavators and Okada Hammers. They have been going non-stop for the past 2 months, working 60-70 hours a week. Lockhart says they are moving "a lot of rock in a short time."
University of Pikeville's new Health Professions Education Building is scheduled to be complete in Fall 2016.
A big thanks to Steve Lockhart, H2O Construction Company of Pikeville, and

title: One of the largest heavy equipment paint booth's in the U.S.

children.text:
[vc_custom_heading text="New Construction Equipment Paint Booth and Shop Location in Walton, KY
" google_fonts="font_family:Roboto%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:900%20bold%20regular%3A900%3Anormal"]Introducing Newman Tractor's newest facility in Walton, Kentucky. Residing on 10 acres of property, our 23,000 foot shop space features a 70x25x25 state-of-the-art paint booth that can handle a variety of heavy construction equipment, making it one of the largest paint booths in the U.S. The additional garage allows our skilled mechanics to assess each piece of equipment individually to perform component rebuilds, run machine diagnostics, weld, fabricate and maintenance our huge inventory of heavy equipment. As Newman Tractor grows, we expand to meet the needs of our customers as well as create new jobs for hardworking Americans. If you're in need of used or new construction equipment for sale or rent, give us a call today at 859-485-8500.

title: Rebuilding the leaking dam in Lake White State Park, Ohio

children.text: Newman Tractor partners with Senesis & Bell America to rebuild the mile long leaking dam in Lake White state park in Ohio. Check out the highlights of these powerful Bell trucks, like the incredible fuel effiency and i-Tip technology (one button dump).

As an authorized Bell dealership, Newman Tractor can not only help you finance a new Bell truck, but we also service them as well. If you need parts, repairs or have any questions about your Bell machine, don't hesitate to call us at 859-485-8500. For more information on our Bell articulated dump trucks for sale, please visit

title: Newman Tractor at IEDA and DCA events 2018

children.text: Newman Tractor goes full throttle in 2018 by participating at two of the largest construction industry events across America. Staying on top of the latest brands, trends and technology - while collaborating with industry leaders - is one of the reasons Newman Tractor continues to be a leader in the
(IEDA) is a self-regulating body of independent dealers who pride themselves on being reputable, highly qualified professionals in the used equipment market worldwide. On the opening day of the

, Rick Newman spoke at the Omni hotel in Orlando, Florida for the IEDA Annual Meeting & Vendor Expo. The day was packed with outstanding presenters who covered topics on leadership, marketing and Tier 4. The round table discussions gave members an opportunity to discuss issues facing their business and the industry. At the events annual golf tournament, Team Newman Tractor brought home the gold for the 4th consecutive year!

(DCA) is a non-profit, professional trade organization formed in 1961 to facilitate the exchange of information related to the construction and maintenance of gas distribution pipeline systems throughout the United States. Members over the years have evolved into turnkey utility contractors that operate at all levels of utility construction and directional drilling. DCA serves as a link between its members, government agencies, organized labor and other industry organizations. Newman Tractor participated at the 57th Annual Convention this year held at the Monarch Beach Resort, in Dana Point, CA. Highlights at the event included a silent auction, 3 mile charity walk and keynote speaker

title: Construction equipment rental quote tool at NewmanTractor.com

children.text: quote tool makes the rental process quicker and easier without needing to install or download software or an app, according to the company.

The new site provides access to Newman Tractor's entire rental fleet and is designed for easy, intuitive operation. Site users can select machine types and number of units required and provide contact information for a quick response.

title: DECONSTRUCTION Season 2 airs every Tuesday on Facebook and YouTube!

children.text: DECONSTRUCTION is BACK! Everyone's favorite construction equipment mechanics are back for Season 2 of DECONSTRUCTION! New episodes start airing this Tuesday, November 13th 2018.
channels and be the first to see new episodes.

title: You're gonna LOVE the MAKEOVER on this 1978 dozer we're sending to Africa!

children.text: On this episode of DeConstruction SEASON 2, Master Provisions, Vennefron and Newman Tractor team up to transform this 1978 D6 dozer into a piece of art before we ship it to Togo, Africa. Togo is one of the poorest countries in the world and will be using the dozer for farming 85 acres to maintain their corn, soybeans, pineapples and more.
channels and be the first to see new episodes.

title: Lifting a MASSIVE dump truck to replace a BENT UP drag link!

children.text: Josh and Dustin pull and replace the suspension on a John Deere 300D articulated dump truck on this episode of DECONSTRUCTION.
channels and be the first to see new episodes.

title: Trade secrets on REMOVING spray paint with NO surface damage

children.text: Forkliff shares his trade secret on how to remove spray paint (or over-spray) off construction equipment without damaging the body paint on this episode of DECONSTRUCTION.
channels and be the first to see new episodes.

title: BLASTING OFF corrosion with a NEEDLE scaler

children.text: Kickin' Kenny shows us how to use a needle scaler to shred years of corrosion off the undercarriage of a water truck on this episode of DECONSTRUCTION.
channels and be the first to see new episodes.

title: RIPPING out a dump bed and WELDING on a personnel carrier

children.text: Sparks fly when Wyatt and Tim only have ONE DAY to cut, grind and weld a personnel carrier onto a 1500 Morooka on this episode of DECONSTRUCTION.
channels and be the first to see new episodes.

title: HOW TO inspect an engine failure on an AGRICULTURAL GIANT

children.text: In part 1 of this 4 part series, Nate disassembles, cleans and inspects a CASE IH STX375 tractor engine on this episode of DECONSTRUCTION.
channels and be the first to see new episodes.
